title: Tomorrow's quake
creator_credit: American Educational Films and Lewis C. Hall
brief_description: This film explores efforts to develop hypotheses on earthquake prediction. Explains continental drift, dilatency, plate techtonics, earthquake mechanics, seismographs, P and S waves, Seismic velocity changes, tilimeters, ground elevation, water wells and unusual animal behaviour.
